Entries.ambient_Forest_Mateo: There's something inherently magical about this place.
Entries.ambient_WizardHouse_Mateo: I haven't been here since I was very little.
Entries.ambient_Mine_Mateo~1: Nothing beats little bit of dungeon crawling.
Entries.ambient_Mine_Mateo~2: I based a D&D storyline off of these mines.
Entries.ambient_Mine_Mateo~3: Be careful, {0}. Things could get rowdy.
Entries.ambient_Town_Mateo: It feels nostalgic to pass through town.
Entries.ambient_Town_Mateo~1: Wonder who we'll see around today!
Entries.ambient_Town_Mateo~2: We should grab some tonics from Doc Harvey.
Entries.ambient_Mountain_Mateo: I feel strangely at home in the mountains.
Entries.ambient_Beach_Mateo: I love a good sunrise off the pier.
Entries.ambient_Beach_Mateo~1: I love a good sunset off the pier.
Entries.ambient_Desert_Mateo: Do you have a prismatic shard on you?
Entries.ambient_Desert_Mateo~1: Have you investigated the weird pillars?
Entries.ambient_Desert_Mateo~3: There are big creature bones here!
Entries.ambient_Saloon_Mateo: Wonder what's on the jukebox tonight.
Entries.ambient_Saloon_Mateo~1: Let me buy you a drink, {0}.
Entries.ambient_ArchaeologyHouse_Mateo: I have a lot of history here...
Entries.ambient_ArchaeologyHouse_Mateo~1: Bringing me back to the scene of the crime, huh?
Entries.ambient_Railroad_Mateo: I hope Sterling has stopped coming up here.
Entries.ambient_Railroad_Mateo~1: Have you been to the summit, {0}?
Entries.fight_Mateo~2: Protecting the valley, one monster at a time.
Entries.fight_Mateo~3: Agh...I need a better armor class, haha!
Entries.fight_Mateo~4: Whoever clears the most, buys the other a drink!
